availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A Kentucky farmer. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1861. Married to Eliza F DeJarnette. Father of Francis DeJarnette, John DeJarnette, Julia DeJarnette, Melvina DeJarnette, George DeJarnette, and E. DeJarnette.

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville Voting District, p. 28; "George DeJarnette," (https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=90196481&ref=acom) (accessed on April 10, 2017).
